en-US.name: One Life
en-US.summary: An extra life to continue the game
en-US.description: An extra life to continue the game

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: An extra life will help you continue the game when you can't answer one correctly.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: You survived this time. Continue with the game.

testingInstructions: You can use this product when you can't answer one correctly and need another life to continue with the game and maintain the streak instead of starting over.
